response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and I believe we can find common ground to make this transaction beneficial for both parties. I am offering the product to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This price reflects my desire to see the product in capable hands while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a successful exchange.", "product_price": 1350000}
